text: Ahh yes... Alundra!  Great game!  Unfortunately it's on my list of games I still have to finish.  I really loved the soundtrack for this one too.  I got stuck on one part of the game and never finished.  There are several tracks from this game that are great to listen to.  The composer, Kohei Tanaka, has actually done more music for anime than games.  Check out the Wikipedia entry on him.
